Installation¶

Installing allesfitter¶

pip install allesfitter

Requirements¶

Standard packages (install via conda/pip; anaconda is recommended):

  • python (>=2.7 or >=3.5)

  • numpy

  • scikit-learn

  • matplotlib

  • seaborn

  • tqdm

Special packages (install via pip):

  • ellc (>=1.8.0) 1

  • dynesty (>=0.9.3) 2

  • emcee (>=3.0rc2) 3

  • celerite (>=0.3.0) 4

  • corner (>=2.0.1) 5

  • rebound (>=3.8.0) 6

Footnotes

1

requires a Fortran compiler; on Mac, you can install one e.g. via brew install gcc

2

optional; for Nested Sampling

3

optional; for MCMC

4

optional; for Gaussian Processes

5

optional; if you want corner plots (you know you do.)

6

optional; if you want top-down-view plots of the orbits
